confirmation.applied.for.job.description: We're crossing our fingers for you right now. If the employer makes an offer, you have 18 hours to accept the offer. You'll find the job under My Applications. This is where you'll also find all communication that happens between you and the employer.

confirmation.contact.description: We will reply as soon as we can.

confirmation.password.reset.description: You can now log in using your new password.

confirmation.signed.for.job.description: Just Arrived will be in touch as soon as possible so don't forget to answer your phone and check your emails

cookies.description: By using the Just Arrived application, you agree to the use of cookies by us and third parties to enhance your experience.
cookies.info.description: We use cookies for technical reasons to simplify the use of our services and to give you the user more relevant information when your visit our website. Cookies are also used to measure traffic to our website, for the collection of data and to improve our services. By using our services, you accept that we use cookies, as long as you have not disabled them in your cookies settings in your web browser.

home.header.logged.in.title: Welcome {{username}}!
home.header.logged.out.description: Just Arrived helps you get the credentials you need to enter the Swedish labor market by matching you with Swedish companies. Right now Just Arrived mediates jobs in Stockholm, Gothenburg and Malmö. Create an account to get started!
home.header.logged.out.sub.title: Get the experience you need to enter the Swedish labor market
home.header.logged.out.title: Welcome!
home.instructions.first.section.instruct: Log in or create an account
home.instructions.first.section.title: This is how it works
home.instructions.second.section.descrip: In order to increase your chances getting a job
home.instructions.second.section.instruc: Apply to all jobs that you like
Log in often and make sure your profile is up to date
home.instructions.second.section.title: Maximize your chances
home.jobs.applied.for.title: Jobs applied for
home.jobs.slider.new.jobs.title: New jobs
home.jobs.slider.user.jobs.title: My Applications
home.partners.description: Just Arrived is a joint pro-bono initiative designed to help newly arrived immigrants to the Swedish labour market. We are owned by a foundation and is run by an association of companies.
home.partners.title: Our partners
how.it.works.section.find.jobs.descripti: Now it is time to begin job searching!
Apply for any and as many jobs you want! Don’t forget to sign in often to see if we have posted any new jobs!
how.it.works.section.register.descriptio: Create your account at Just Arrived.
The registration form takes one minute to complete and is open for all newcomers and asylum seekers. You will also receive news and updates from Just Arrived after registration.
how.it.works.section.update.profile.desc: This is the most important thing to increase your chances of getting any job through Just Arrived!
Make sure to fill in every relevant piece of information and all your skills. If your profile is empty you won’t be matched with any jobs.
